models.name: Mention
models.description: Represents a mention of a user within the content of a status.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The account id of the mentioned user.

fields.name: username
fields.description: The username of the mentioned user.

fields.name: acct
fields.description: The webfinger acct: URI of the mentioned user. Equivalent to username for local users, or username@domain for remote users.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The location of the mentioned user's profile.
